closed_reason: Added live file tracking: WriteLive writes AgentStateSnapshot to .tick/logs/records/<tick-id>.live.json during runs, FinalizeLive renames to .json on completion. Engine StateCallback now wraps user callback to also write live files. Added LiveExists, DeleteLive helpers. Tests cover all new functionality.
description: Update engine to use agent.RunOpts.StateCallback to write current AgentStateSnapshot to .tick/runlog/<tick-id>.live.json on each state change. On run completion, call FinalizeLive() to convert to final .json. This enables tickboard to watch the file for real-time updates.
title: Hook engine StateCallback to write AgentStateSnapshot to .live.json during runs
